tags: sorta like the robots you can build in fo4
it wouldnt technically be a companion
since they wouldnt need affinity ratings or as advanced AI
summary: Since we could get Flathead (that cute lil Robot from the demo) to follow us around with a chip. We can probably do the same for...
body: Since we could get Flathead (that cute lil Robot from the demo) to follow us around with a chip. We can probably do the same for other robots, maybe by buying them or building them. And we could have multiple at a time. That could open up cool builds like a techie/netrunner who has a mini army of robots doing their fighting or as backup for a solo.

reblog.comment: Since we could get Flathead (that cute lil Robot from the demo) to follow us around with a chip. We can probably do the same for other robots, maybe by buying them or building them. And we could have multiple at a time. That could open up cool builds like a techie/netrunner who has a mini army of robots doing their fighting or as backup for a solo.

trail.content_raw: Since we could get Flathead (that cute lil Robot from the demo) to follow us around with a chip. We can probably do the same for other robots, maybe by buying them or building them. And we could have multiple at a time. That could open up cool builds like a techie/netrunner who has a mini army of robots doing their fighting or as backup for a solo.
trail.content: Since we could get Flathead (that cute lil Robot from the demo) to follow us around with a chip. We can probably do the same for other robots, maybe by buying them or building them. And we could have multiple at a time. That could open up cool builds like a techie/netrunner who has a mini army of robots doing their fighting or as backup for a solo.

blog.name: coggedcorset
blog.title: Eccentric Eclectic
blog.description: A little bit of everything; my own art included!

summary: YAY! ART! been a while since i posted something more then sketch dumps. So i am SUPER excited for cyberpunk 2077, the E3 trailer...
caption:
YAY! ART! been a while since i posted something more then sketch dumps.

So i am SUPER excited for cyberpunk 2077, the E3 trailer looked amazing, the fact that it’s singleplayer and story driven, the fact that it has character creation and you can be essentially pansexual. Then the gameplay reveal and i am in loooooove!

so i’ve already been planning headcanons/AUs because my long time character Vincent is perfect for it. The main character’s name is V! like i couldn’t choose anyone else! But since Bucky is my current marvel obsession since they don’t seem to want to give me any more hawkeye (dicks) i think he would also fit into the setting and that’s why bucky’s arm is wrapped around Vincent.

I am super happy with how this turned out!

Ko-fi for sketches

summary: Name: MTOD12 Control Chip  Type: Cybernetics, wetware  Description: Neural bridge chip used to control the MTOD12 bot, insert...
caption:
Name: MTOD12 Control Chip

Type: Cybernetics, wetware

Description: Neural bridge chip used to control the MTOD12 bot, insert into chip socket.

BCI Interface Motherboard: Carbon nanotube network core linking the brain to the signal-inducing shard. Use of carbon nanotubes as conductors allows for a reaction time and signal depth equaling that of the neurotransmitters in the central nervous system. Multiple devices can be connected to the brain via the same shard.

Overclock Chip: Synapse overload and neuron damage are possible during the neutral bridging process. Likely symptoms include user disorientation, muscle spasms, auditory hallucinations and flashes of light within the visual field. Prolonged overload may lead to gradual degeneration of the nervous system and death.

tags: please dont hate me i tried my best
summary: Here is the beginning of my first fanfic about Cyberpunk 2017. I haven’t written anything for online before so I hope you like...
body:
Here is the beginning of my first fanfic about Cyberpunk 2017. I haven’t written anything for online before so I hope you like it and let me know what you think. I’ll post more probably tomorrow??

—

Jackie and V were lounging in a corner booth at Afterlife, enjoying the evening with the Eddies they earned from finishing that Deshawn job. Jackie was a few beers in while V was working his way through the cocktail menu, complaining that his current one was too bitter, not that it stopped him from finishing it. Both mercenaries were feeling a little buzz but nowhere near hammered just yet, but the night was still young.


The music was loud and V was revelling in the bass passing through his body as he watched the crowd jump and move to the beat. The dance floor was practically alive with the amount of jumping, swaying and gyrating going on. It was around about his 5th drink that V decided he wanted in on that, and he wanted to dance with Jackie.

It was around about his 5th drink that V decided he wanted in on that, and he wanted to dance with Jackie.

tags: i dont want to be the obvious hero like so many other games
not that i dont like that but ive seen it so much and im looking forward to a change
summary: What I like about Cyberpunk 2077 (just another one of many) is that it’s a story about you. What I mean is that your character...
body:
What I like about Cyberpunk 2077 (just another one of many) is that it’s a story about you. What I mean is that your character isn’t some super important person who’s going to save the world, win the war, be the only one with a brain or making all the big choices. You are literally only looking out for yourself and judging by what CD Projekt Red have said, it sounds like there will be some decent moral choices we will face. Things like, escape a burning building alone or risk it all and try and save a stranger, for a bad example.

But I’m looking forward to it, just a Cyberpunk trying to make it in Night City!

I’m going to...
body:
Cyberpunk 2020 handbook : Version 2

These pages from the handbook are all about building your player character.

I’m going to use these to help me flesh out my V for Cyberpunk 2077. I need whatever I can get until it comes out.

title: Las misiones secundarias de Cyberpunk 2077 serán algo nunca visto
body:
Las misiones secundarias de Cyberpunk 2077 serán algo nunca visto

CD Projekt RED sigue dispuesta a ponernos los dientes largos con Cyberpunk 2077, uno de los juegos más esperados para esta recta final de la generación. Tras sorprendernos con su primer gameplay, ahora prometen innovar con las misiones secundarias.

http://nosologamer.com/los-fallos-en-las-misiones-de-cyberpunk-2077-pueden-alterar-la-historia/
